explanation: Multiple participants express strong bullishness for BTC, expecting an imminent rise towards all-time highs and even higher targets by the end of June. Sentiment is largely positive, with specific price targets (110k-125k) and references to technical indicators (VWAP). Only minor caution is noted about potential downside, but the overwhelming majority anticipate upward momentum.
